short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: connect, share resources, and earn rewards within the Gaea network.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gaea is an innovative startup focused on decentralized AI, dedicated to making public network data more accessible to open-source AI projects. Gaea aims to create a decentralized platform that fuels AI evolution.

Through a mechanism that clusters idle network resources, Gaea acts as a marketplace to allocate and supplement these resources, boosting overall network efficiency. Get GAEA now and join the journey of AI evolution!
